command-error.no-user-permission: Error executing command: no user permission.
command-error.no-app-permission: Error executing command: no application permission.
command-error.not-found: Error executing command: no information found.
command-error.on-cool-down: You are on cool down for this command.

smart-reply.no-menu-permission: This menu can only be used by the user who invoked the command or the user tagged.
smart-reply.info-sent: The requested info has been posted.
smart-reply.dm-error: Oof. There was a problem sending the information by DM.
